name: LINE-JBot
description: A simple LINE bot using Node.js

PREFIX.description: symbol to initiate the bot command. if leaved blank it will use point(.) as the prefix

CHANNEL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: LINE channel access token for the bot

CHANNEL_SECRET.description: LINE Channel secret code for the bot

SNOWFLAKE_STUDIO_API_KEY.decription: snowflake studio API key for AI chatbot feature. you can leave this option or use your own key

CSE_ID.description: the CSE(custom search engine) ID for image search, you can leave it or use your own CSE

G_API_KEY.description: google API Key to trigger the CSE API, you can leave it or use your own API key but remember the limitation is 100 requests per day
